text: Hopea longirostrata is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is endemic to Borneo, where it is confined to Sarawak. ==References== longirostrata Category:Endemic flora of Borneo Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Flora of Sarawak Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea longirostrata
